filter.description: Filter parameters to apply on returned events

follow.description: Print events until process is halted

format.description: the output format, defaults to log (choices: csv, json, log, table, value, yaml)

limit.description: Limit the number of events returned

marker.description: Only return events that appear after the given ID

nested_depth.description: Depth of nested stacks from which to display events. Note: this cannot be specified with --resource

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

resource.description: Name of resource to show events for. Note: this cannot be specified with --nested-depth

sort.description: Sort output by selected keys and directions (asc or desc) (default: asc). Specify multiple times to sort on multiple keys. Sort key can be: "event_time" (default), "resource_name", "links", "logical_resource_id", "resource_status", "resource_status_reason", "physical_resource_id", or "id". You can leave the key empty and specify ":desc" for sorting by reverse time.

stack.description: Name or ID of stack to show events for
